summary.span: 一个专用的 ，提供建立有两种结果的条件节点模型的能力。

span.span: A specialized that provides the ability to model a conditional node with two outcomes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果条件为或，则使用条件并定义要执行的操作 `true` `false` 。 uses a condition and defines actions to take if the condition is `true` or `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 节点。The following code sample demonstrates creating a node. 此示例来自 [使用 TryCatch 示例的 Flowchart 活动中的错误处理](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch) 。This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch) sample. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果条件的计算结果为 `true` ，则 执行属性中的。If the condition evaluates to `true`, the in the property is executed. 否则，执行 属性中的 。Otherwise the in the property is executed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 节点的 Condition 属性。The following code sample demonstrates using the Condition property of a node. 此示例来自 [使用 TryCatch 示例的 Flowchart 活动中的错误处理](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch) 。This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch) sample.
